body: Elves who live in cities for more than a century can grow to know the ebb and flow of social situations just as their forest-dwelling cousins know the rules of the wild. Elves with this racial trait gain a +2 racial bonus on Diplomacy checks made to gather information and Sense Motive checks made to get a hunch about a social situation. This racial trait replaces keen senses.
name: Urbanite
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Elves/Alternate Racial Rules/Alternate Racial Traits/Urbanite
